H0.text: Snakes are the symbol of which saint. Saint Patrick

H1.text: Snakes are the symbol of which saint. Saint Sebastian

H2.text: Snakes are the symbol of which saint. Saint John the Evangelist

H3.text: Snakes are the symbol of which saint. Maewyn

A6.text: Saint Patrick is purported to have expelled all snakes from Ireland while converting the country to Christianity in the 5th century, thus explaining the absence of snakes there.
